Product Features

A classic black, cotton, unisex T-shirt with short sleeves. The details that make it unique include inscriptions on the front and back of the T-shirt 
(#jestemzAGH
) and a sateen tag with the 
Wiedza Pasja Więź
 motto. Made of high-quality material. Made in Poland.

Both models wear size S. 

Unisex style – women should consider selecting a smaller size to avoid the oversize effect.

fabric: 92% cotton and 8% elastane
weight: 160 g
